name: pdfviewer
description: A React Native component for viewing PDF documents with loading states and error handling.

source.name: source
source.description: PDF source object with uri property or string URL.

style.name: style
style.description: Custom style for the PDF viewer container.

onLoadComplete.name: onLoadComplete
onLoadComplete.description: Callback when PDF is loaded successfully. Returns number of pages and file path.

onError.name: onError
onError.description: Callback when PDF fails to load. Returns error details.

onPageChanged.name: onPageChanged
onPageChanged.description: Callback when user navigates to a different page. Returns current page and total pages.
